resources.string: Anyone you invite must be a trusted tester
This rematch has already been started!
This match has locally-modified data. This operation cannot be performed until the match is sent to the server.
There was an issue with sign in. Please try again later.
Uh-oh, you\'ve found a bug! Please notify the developer so they can find a fix asap.
Most likely you have an older version of this app. Check the Play Store for an update?
It appears you are running an older version of this app which is incompatible with other players in this game. Check the Play Store for an update?
It appears whoever started the game has an older version of this app which is incompatible. They will need to update and start a new game. This one has been cancelled.
